front.title: GSMP extensions for layer2 control (L2C) Topology Discovery and Line Configuration

abstract.t: This document describes proposed extensions to the GSMP protocol to allow its use in a broadband environment, as a control plane between Access Nodes (e.g. DSLAM) and Broadband Network Gateways (e.g. BRAS). This document focuses on specific use cases, topology discovery and line configuration. It is intended to be complemented by other Internet-drafts focusing on additional use cases.
